What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.When Force of will is played, the player may lose 1 life and exile a card from his/her hand instead of paying 3UU
2.Whenever a player chooses this option, the game tells to choose a card
3.The player looses 1 life and a copy of the card is put in the exiled card list. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? It is expected a card from the player's hand to be discarded and exiled. Instead the player keeps the choosen card and a copy is put in the exiled card list, created from nowhere. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? magarena 1.39 Windows 7 ultimate. If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). MAGARENA GAME LOG
CREATED ON 2013/07/16 12:28:33
MAGARENA VERSION 1.39, JRE 1.7.0_25, OS Windows 7_6.1 x86 Please provide any additional information below. There is no info in my files because I reinstalled, sorry.
